item.title: My plans for this blog
item.description: I often spend many hours solving a complex problem and have a terrible habit of forgetting to document how exactly I solved it. After a few months passed, I stumbled into the same situation again. Because I didnâ€™t document it, I need to dedicate hours to solve it with the minimal amount of context I have from the previous attempt. Additionally, being able to log and view how my journey in this industry has progressed is something I have always wanted to do.
